summaries: The document is a Form 10-K annual report for Oracle Corporation, filed on May 31, 2025. This report provides financial information and disclosures required by the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. Oracle Corporation's common stock (ORCL) is traded on the New York Stock Exchange, with a market value of $305,793,119,000 as of November 29, 2024 (the last business day of the registrant’s most recently completed second fiscal quarter). As of June 13, 2025, there are 2,808,833,000 shares of common stock outstanding. No errors were found in previously issued financial statements, and no recovery analysis of incentive-based compensation was needed for the relevant recovery period. The full proxy statement for Oracle Corporation's 2025 annual meeting of stockholders will be filed within 120 days of May 31, 2025.
